Detailed Description

Classification algorithm based on the KNN paradigm.

This class implements the ClassificationAlgorithm class using the KNN paradigm for classifying and/or training purposes. The number of neighbours to take into account is set in the class constructor, as well as the necessary dataset.

Author:

KnnClassificationAlgorithm::KnnClassificationAlgorithm ( const unsigned int &  kNeighbours,
DatasetEngine  engine 
) [explicit]

Constructor.

Parameters:
kNeighbours Number of neighbours to take when classifying.
engine A dataset engine information to load a dataset.
Precondition:
The dataset must not be empty or set to a null value.
Warning:
A client program or function must be aware since this class only uses the dataset and does not manage it.

Classify a set of feature vectors into their most probably classes.

Parameters:
featureVectors An array of feature vectors.
Returns:
An array of characters, one character per feature vector passes.

Implements ClassificationAlgorithm.

double KnnClassificationAlgorithm::train ( const std::vector< FeatureVector > &  featureVectors,
const std::vector< std::string > &  characters,
const Text &  referenceText 
) [virtual]

Train the classifier, comparing each classification decision with a reference text.

Parameters:
featureVectors An array of feature vectors.
characters An array of std::string objects with characters that match the feature vectors.
referenceText A text to compare with the characters passed.
Precondition:
The size of featureVectors, characters and referenceText must be equal.
Postcondition:
The dataset might be updated with the addition of new samples.
Returns:
The hit rate achieved after training (e.g. 0,9 for 90%).

Implements ClassificationAlgorithm.
